containers.title: Terracotta Clay Pot
containers.description: Classic and breathable, ideal for succulents, cacti, and herbs.

containers.title: Ceramic Glazed Pot
containers.description: Stylish and versatile, available in various glazes and sizes for diverse plants.

containers.title: Durable Plastic Pot
containers.description: Lightweight and affordable, perfect for indoor and outdoor plants.

containers.title: Hanging Basket
containers.description: Adds vertical interest, ideal for trailing plants and balcony gardens.

containers.title: Self-Watering Pot
containers.description: Reduces watering frequency, keeps plants thriving during busy schedules.

containers.title: Raised Garden Bed
containers.description: Improves soil drainage and offers better access for vegetables and herbs.

containers.title: Window Box
containers.description: Adds color and charm to windowsills, perfect for herbs and flowers.

containers.title: Planter Trio Set
containers.description: Three coordinating planters in different sizes, ideal for creating focal points.

tools.title: Gardening Gloves
tools.description: Protect your hands from dirt, thorns, and blisters. Choose breathable and flexible materials.

tools.title: Garden Trowel
tools.description: Ideal for scooping soil, planting seeds, and transplanting seedlings. Opt for a stainless steel trowel for durability.

tools.title: Garden Spade
tools.description: Digging holes, edging borders, and turning compost are simple with a sturdy spade. Consider weight and handle length for comfort.

tools.title: Garden Fork
tools.description: Loosening soil, aerating compost, and turning over mulch are easier with a garden fork. Look for sturdy tines and a comfortable handle.

tools.title: Gardening Shears
tools.description: Pruning branches, trimming herbs, and harvesting vegetables require reliable shears. Choose bypass shears for clean cuts and precision.

tools.title: Pruning Saw
tools.description: For thicker branches, clean cuts & minimal damage.

tools.title: Hand Rake
tools.description: Versatile for smoothing soil, leaves, & mulch.

tools.title: Leaf Blower/Vacuum
tools.description: Saves time & effort battling fall leaves.

tools.title: Watering Can
tools.description: Directly nourishes roots & minimizes waste.

tools.title: Hose & Nozzle
tools.description: Efficient water delivery for larger gardens.

tools.title: Wheelbarrow
tools.description: Effortless hauling of soil, compost, & mulch.

tools.title: Garden Kneeler
tools.description: Comfy kneeler for protecting knees & balance.

tools.title: Seed Starting Trays
tools.description: Sprouts vegetables, herbs, & flowers indoors.

tools.title: Garden Gloves with Claws
tools.description: Protection & grip for digging & pulling weeds.

tools.title: Pruning Loppers
tools.description: Reach high branches & tackle thicker stems.

tools.title: Garden Hoe
tools.description: Weeding, aerating soil, & creating furrows.

tools.title: Gardening Hat
tools.description: Sun protection for face & neck (breathable materials).

tools.title: Pruning Snippers
tools.description: Precise control for delicate trimming & sculpting.

tools.title: Gardening Kneeler Pad
tools.description: Portable comfort & protection while kneeling (waterproof & stain-resistant).

tools.title: Soil Tester
tools.description: Monitors soil pH & nutrients for optimal plant growth.

fertilizers.title: All-Purpose Garden Fertilizer
fertilizers.description: Provides essential nutrients for a wide variety of plants, promoting healthy growth and blooms.

fertilizers.title: Tomato & Vegetable Fertilizer
fertilizers.description: Specially formulated to boost yield and flavor in tomatoes, peppers, cucumbers, and other vegetables.

fertilizers.title: Rose & Flower Fertilizer
fertilizers.description: Encourages abundant blooms and vibrant colors in roses, annuals, and perennials.

fertilizers.title: Citrus & Fruit Tree Fertilizer
fertilizers.description: Supports vigorous growth and juicy fruit production in citrus trees, apple trees, and other fruit trees.

fertilizers.title: Lawn Fertilizer
fertilizers.description: Promotes thick, green, and healthy lawns with balanced nutrients and weed control.

fertilizers.title: All-Natural Organic Fertilizer
fertilizers.description: Made from plant-based ingredients, ideal for gardeners who prefer eco-friendly options.

fertilizers.title: Compost
fertilizers.description: Rich, nutrient-rich soil amendment made from decomposed organic matter, improves soil health and fertility.

flowers.title: English Lavender
flowers.description: Fragrant blooms and beautiful foliage, attracts bees and butterflies.

flowers.title: Hydrangeas
flowers.description: Puffy spheres of vibrant blooms in diverse colors, a showstopper for any landscape.

flowers.title: Tulips
flowers.description: A symbol of spring and new beginnings, available in a rainbow of colors.

flowers.title: Orchids
flowers.description: Exotic elegance with long-lasting blooms, ideal for luxury gifts.

flowers.title: Peonies
flowers.description: Fluffy mounds of delicate petals, perfect for romantic occasions and symbolizing prosperity.

flowers.title: Garden Roses
flowers.description: The classic symbol of love and romance, in a spectrum of colors and fragrances.

flowers.title: Ranunculus
flowers.description: Playful pom-poms in vibrant hues, adding cheerfulness to any occasion.

flowers.title: Calla Lilies
flowers.description: Elegant and sophisticated, ideal for funerals and symbolizing purity.

flowers.title: Anemones
flowers.description: Delicate and graceful, symbolizing anticipation and hope.

flowers.title: Freesias
flowers.description: Sweetly scented trumpet-shaped blooms in various colors, symbolizing friendship and trust.

flowers.title: Poppies
flowers.description: Bold and vibrant with papery red, orange, and pink petals, symbolizing remembrance and hope.

flowers.title: Dahlias
flowers.description: Showstopping blooms in dazzling shapes and colors, adding drama and signifying gratitude.

flowers.title: Gerbera Daisies
flowers.description: Sunny smiles with cheerful yellow, orange, pink, and red petals, symbolizing innocence and joy.

flowers.title: Irises
flowers.description: Delicate and elegant with velvety petals in purple, blue, and white, symbolizing wisdom and hope.

flowers.title: Lilies
flowers.description: Fragrant beauties with white, pink, and yellow blooms, symbolizing purity and devotion.

flowers.title: Delphiniums
flowers.description: Tall spikes of delicate blue, purple, and white florets, symbolizing joy and an open heart.

flowers.title: Alstroemerias
flowers.description: Long-lasting and versatile with vibrant colors, symbolizing friendship and prosperity.

flowers.title: Hyacinths
flowers.description: Sweetly scented clusters in blue, purple, pink, and white, symbolizing playfulness and gratitude.

flowers.title: Marigolds
flowers.description: Cheerful and vibrant with yellow, orange, and red blooms, symbolizing warmth and longevity.

flowers.title: Sunflowers
flowers.description: Cheerful giants with radiant yellow faces, perfect for summer gardens and bouquets.

shrubs.title: Butterfly Bush
shrubs.description: Attracts butterflies and hummingbirds with fragrant spikes of blooms in various colors.

shrubs.title: Hydrangea
shrubs.description: Showy blooms in shades of blue, pink, and white, perfect for borders and containers.

shrubs.title: Rose of Sharon
shrubs.description: Produces large, trumpet-shaped flowers in various colors, thrives in full sun.

shrubs.title: Azalea
shrubs.description: Known for their vibrant spring blossoms in shades of pink, purple, red, and white.

shrubs.title: Lilac
shrubs.description: Fragrant, cone-shaped clusters of flowers in shades of purple, pink, and white.

shrubs.title: Rhododendron
shrubs.description: Showy evergreen shrub with large, colorful blossoms in spring, ideal for shady areas.

shrubs.title: Spirea
shrubs.description: Long-lasting, graceful clusters of blooms in various colors, perfect for borders and hedges.

shrubs.title: Forsythia
shrubs.description: Bright yellow, early-blooming shrub that heralds the arrival of spring.

shrubs.title: Weigela
shrubs.description: Produces trumpet-shaped blooms in pink, red, and white, attracts hummingbirds.

shrubs.title: Viburnum
shrubs.description: Versatile shrub with diverse varieties offering fragrant flowers, colorful berries, and fall foliage.

shrubs.title: Boxwood
shrubs.description: Evergreen shrub known for its dense foliage and formal shape, ideal for hedges and topiary.

shrubs.title: Holly
shrubs.description: Evergreen shrub with iconic red berries and glossy foliage, a winter holiday favorite.

shrubs.title: Winterberry
shrubs.description: Deciduous shrub that produces vibrant red berries in fall and winter, attracts birds.

shrubs.title: Clethra
shrubs.description: Known as 'summersweet' for its fragrant, late-summer blooms, thrives in moist conditions.

shrubs.title: Ninebark
shrubs.description: Deciduous shrub with interesting peeling bark and clusters of white or pink flowers.

trendingPlants.title: Monstera Thai Constellation
trendingPlants.description: Striking variegated foliage, unique and eye-catching.

trendingPlants.title: Philodendron Birkin
trendingPlants.description: Elongated leaves with captivating stripes, perfect for hanging baskets.

trendingPlants.title: String of Pearls
trendingPlants.description: Delicate and charming, ideal for adding texture to shelves or terrariums.

trendingPlants.title: Pilea Peperomioides (Pancake Plant)
trendingPlants.description: Round, coin-shaped leaves, easy to care for and brings good vibes.

trendingPlants.title: Jade Plant (Money Plant)
trendingPlants.description: Symbol of prosperity and luck, thick leaves with vibrant green color.

trendingPlants.title: English Lavender
trendingPlants.description: Fragrant blooms and beautiful foliage, attracts bees and butterflies.

trendingPlants.title: Calathea Orbifolia
trendingPlants.description: Unique textured leaves, a conversation starter for any living space.

trendingPlants.title: Black-Eyed Susan
trendingPlants.description: Cheerful annuals with vibrant yellow daisy-like flowers, attract pollinators.

trendingPlants.title: Air Plant Tillandsia
trendingPlants.description: Low-maintenance and air purifying, perfect for unique displays.

trees.title: Oak Tree
trees.description: Majestic and long-lived, provides ample shade and habitat for wildlife.

trees.title: Maple Tree
trees.description: Vibrant autumn colors, ideal for landscaping and adding visual interest.

trees.title: Cherry Blossom Tree
trees.description: Elegant and iconic, showcases beautiful pink blooms in spring.

trees.title: Pine Tree
trees.description: Evergreen beauty, perfect for winter landscapes and providing year-round greenery.

trees.title: Magnolia Tree
trees.description: Large, fragrant flowers and glossy leaves, adds a touch of Southern charm.

trees.title: Dogwood Tree
trees.description: Springtime blossoms in pink or white, great for ornamental gardens.

trees.title: Willow Tree
trees.description: Graceful branches and drooping foliage, often near water features.

trees.title: Birch Tree
trees.description: Distinctive white bark and delicate leaves, adds visual appeal to landscapes.

trees.title: Cypress Tree
trees.description: Tall and slender evergreen, commonly used for privacy screening.

trees.title: Redwood Tree
trees.description: Towering and long-lived, native to California and prized for its beauty.

trees.title: Eucalyptus Tree
trees.description: Aromatic foliage and fast growth, known for its medicinal properties.

trees.title: Elm Tree
trees.description: Sturdy and adaptable, often used for urban street planting.

trees.title: Mimosa Tree
trees.description: Fern-like foliage and pink, fluffy flowers, adds a touch of tropical beauty.

trees.title: Japanese Maple Tree
trees.description: Dwarf varieties with stunning foliage, perfect for small gardens.

trees.title: Palm Tree
trees.description: Iconic tropical tree, adds a touch of paradise to outdoor spaces.
